title: The Best Lesson
content: The best chapter of life is being a parent and a significant other, they go together. When you love someone so much that you want more of them, so you make a copy of them.Once you have a child watching them grow and being there is like a life multiplier, it doesn't make you live longer but it slows the pace of your life down. You get to enjoy the little things even more and you get to spend those moments surrounded with unconditional love. Find the right person and your life will transform on a level that is impossible to describe.
